title.rendered: SSHS Drama Club presents “Head Over Heels”

content.rendered:
The Saratoga Springs High School Drama Club presents “Head Over Heels.”  The show will take place in the Loewenberg Auditorium at Saratoga Springs High School.

This faux Shakespearean styled show takes us on a journey of self discovery, inclusion, and acceptance.  In contrast to the style of the book the music is by the 1980”s all female pop/rock group the GoGo’s. It features some of their most popular songs such as, We Got the Beat, Vacation, Head Over Heels and Heaven is a Place on Earth to name a few.

Show Times:

  • Thursday, March 14 at 7 p.m.
  • Friday, March 15 at 7:30 p.m.
  • Saturday, March 16 at 1 p.m. and 7:30 p.m.

Tickets are $17 for adults and $12 for students and children.  Click here to purchase tickets.  Tickets will also be available one hour before each performance at the theater entrance.

View a promo video for the show.
